orgs.name: 1 US
orgs.mission: Many more words than are neccessary to state the simple idea that the reason that this organization exists is so that people in the United States, whether nationals or immigrants, have an organization that they can be a part of, take place in, know about, go to, tell people about, or think about while living or not living in the United States of America.

children.name: 38 ST
children.mission: A whole lot of words to explain that the purpose of the 38th state is to ensure global superiority of the United States of America from smack dab in the middle of the country by providing support, sustainment, and Rocky Mountains from within the confines of Colorado state lines.

children.name: 364 CTY
children.mission: To provide holistic support to the 38 ST by providing a single place for state leaders to assemble, congregate, meet, or gather to discuss matters pertaining to Colorado.

children.name: 518 CTY
children.mission: To provide support to the herbacultural needs of Colorado, as well as to provide necessary support for strategic military facilities such as North American Aerospace Defense Command (NORAD).

children.name: 472 BLK
children.mission: Colorado Springs, needed a block... Here we are!

children.name: 28 ST
children.mission: Assure the security of the United States with large, superfluous, or immense belt buckles, rodeos, and guns under the direction of the governor and his cabinet.

children.name: 1 CTY
children.mission: Provide a single meeting place for leaders of the largest contiguous US state in order to discuss the pressing, important, imperative, or necessary matters assuring that the United States stay the #1 country and Texas stay the largest contiguous state in the aforementioned country through any means under the guidance of the President of the United States.
